title: Staff of Crones
content:
of Crones Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 100 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: ?? The staff allows you to cast Ray of Sickness at Level 1 once per Short Rest.

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's Giantslayer ♦ Battle-Worn Blade ♦ Battleaxe ♦ Battleaxe +1 ♦ Battleaxe +2 ♦ Belm ♦ Bigboy's Chew Toy
